alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 9:40AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northeastern Sumner Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 939 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Andover to near Belle Plaine to near Viola. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Winfield, Andover, Haysville, Wellington, Park City, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Oxford, Garden Plain, Udall and Downtown Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 13. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 18 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
